BEAUTIFULLY UNCOMPLICATED
software to manage process, people and financials

  • Product

  • Agile
    Delivery
  • Other
    Tools

  • Tools & Features

    PPMA has many great tools and features that save time and increase workflow. Click on the tabs and take a look.

      Request a demo

  • Status Reporting

    Create beautifully presented, professional status reports quickly and easily. Export to PDF or PowerPoint in a few clicks.

      Request a demo

  • Resource Balancer

    This tool simply cuts through the complicated task of knowing who is doing what, where and when in your organisation.

      Request a demo

  • Executive Scorecards

    We believe that people are more engaged when you create something they want to use rather than something they have to use.

      Request a demo

  • PM Workbook

    Bringing it all together for the Project Manager. The PM Workbook pulls data together from various sources into one simple tabbed page.

      Request a demo

  • Financial Analysis

    Using ‘Agreed Visual Frameworks” our financial dashboards indicate the overall financial health clearly to users at any level.

      Request a demo

  • Recording Time

    Speed up the whole timesheet process with our clean a simple tool. Banish the Friday time sheet blues with a welcoming and intuitive experience.

      Request a demo

  • Agile Delivery

    The adaptability of our product means you can configure project types and processes that are suitable for any delivery methodology.

      Request a demo

  • Multi-slide ppt export
    Process driven workflows & templates
    Configurable Landing pages

Let's have a quick chat

We would love to see if we can help you get the best out of your team and help them improve their business workflows.

The best way we can do that is to arrange a demo. Drop us a line or give us a call. We’ll be happy to help.

  • UK & EU Regions
  • info@polarisoft.com
  • +44 (207) 193 5352
  • 13-15 Bouverie Street, Harmsworth House, London EC4Y 8DP
  • US Region
  • info@polarisoft.com

http.title: Polarisoft
http.html:
• Home
  • Our software
  • Our Services
  • Our history
  • Contact

BEAUTIFULLY UNCOMPLICATED

software to manage process, people and financials

Strategise, Plan, Collaborate and Improve

  Tell me more

WE ARE
BUSINESS
TECHNOLOGY
PARTNERS

People friendly technology that helps your business work

Our software

PPMAnywhere

Our enterprise level offering. Get your team pulling in the same direction using Process Driven Collaboration. Featuring dynamic dashboards and scorecards. Drag & drop resource management, lightning fast Status reports and one-click exports.

Learn more at www.ppmanywhere.com

Our Services

Consulting Services

Gain an advantage, our team has many years of real life experience and success stories.

Subject Matter Expertise Our professional services team provides a wide range of consultancy expertise based on many years of real life experience and success stories.

Strategy and roadmap development
Process design and analysis
Project and programme management
Training and development
Change management
Our consultants cover the entire spectrum of roles, including Business Analysis, Change Management, Training and Development, Support Consultant, PMO Analysts and Managers, Project Management and Principal Consultant.

Technical Consultancy Our highly skilled team provides a wide range of expertise focused on achieving success for customers. We provide guidance from technical strategy through to implementation and support.

Managed Services

Achieve consistent long-term ROI and turn business processes into repeatable and predictable success.

Benefits As A Service Our managed services team has great experience in turning business processes and technology into repeatable and predictable success.

We are able to provide a more consistent long-term ROI than building and maintaining an internal function. Hence, we often refer to it as “Benefits as a Service”. All of the benefits, none of the work.

Lightning PMO The Lightning PMO service takes the fuss and effort out of running a PMO internally. This turnkey solution allows you to hit the ground running and gain the strategic value without any of the hassle of running it on a day to day basis. Avoid the problems of maintaining a team: hiring and firing, transference of skills and retain organisational memory.

Fully Defined Mature Process Framework
Enterprise PPM Software
Enhanced Support & Live Chat
Predictable costs
PMO Staff to support your Internal PMO (Optional)

Our history

Contact

Drop us a line, we can organise a time to chat or to meet to discuss any questions or specific requirements you might have.

If not, you can contact us on the details below.

  • UK & EU Regions
  • info@polarisoft.com
  • +44 (207) 692 5697
  • 13-15 Bouverie Street, Harmsworth House, London EC4Y 8DP
  • US Region
  • info@polarisoft.com
  • +1 (646) 583 1002
  • Polarisoft LLC, 8 The Green, Suite 4203, Dover, DE 19901
